Problem 1 (Intel Dataset)

a.

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data=intel, aes(x=Close, y=Date, group=1)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  expand_limits(y=0) +
  xlab("Close") + ylab("Date") +
  ggtitle("closing price vs. the date")
```
